title: Over A Cappuccino, Italian Mayor Wants To Hear Local Concerns
teaser: A mayor in Italy is inviting his citizens to share their ideas over breakfast. Pino Palmieri asked residents of Roscigno to meet him at the town's main bar. He's using his own dough to pay the tab.
